name: 與魔共舞 我的頌歌
name_original: 與魔共舞 我的頌歌
description:
Will you fall in love with the devils?
In Shikou-cho, the devils and the vampires are secretly vying for the Grimoire in the dark.
How will the devils deal with the upcoming occurrences?
And what the future holds for you two after falling in love?
Known as a highly popular game, Dance with Devils, the FD version is about to unfold!

▪ A story with rich variations
From lively stories featuring all the characters,
To sweet tales of life after becoming lovers,
And all kinds of epilogues after endings—
Choose and enjoy your favorite from various storylines.

▪ Choices: Human or Devil?
Make a choice in front of your devilish lover!
Dialogues in every option were all recorded with dummy head mic.
Which one will you choose, Human or Devil?
Please enjoy his different reactions!

▪ Special Voice Collection
From sweet whispers to various anecdotes,
Enjoy special voices from all characters.
Unfold the stories, collect points, and unlock voices!
Jek, Azuna, and Pomeranian will also be in this special voice collection!

Additionally, brand new exquisite illustrations and card collections are also on the way!

▪ Theme Song with devils featuring
「光れCAROL」
Lyrics: Daisuke Iwasaki
Composition: Junpei Fujita (Elements Garden)
Arrangement: Yuta Kasai (Elements Garden)
Performed by: PENTACLE★★ (Vo. Soma Saito, Wataru Hatano, Takashi Kondo, Subaru Kimura, Daisuke Hirakawa, Tatsuhisa Suzuki)
